content: Create a JanusXR room with a simple space scene. We'll start with a blank room, with an assetimage named "stars" pointing to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jbaicoianu/elation-component-space/refs/heads/master/images/galaxy_starfield.png and <room skybox_equi="stars">

Created a new JanusXR room with a simple space scene. Added an `assetimage` named "stars" pointing to the specified URL and set the room's skybox accordingly. Let me know if you'd like to add any other elements or make further customizations.
Add an assetscript pointing to the entities.js file in this same directory
I've added an `assetscript` referencing `entities.js` as you requested. Let me know if you need any further modifications or have any questions.

Add a <spacezone-level> object to our room, with 10 <spacezone-waypoint> child objects. These waypoints should define the basic route of an obstacle course through which the player will need to navigate their ship, so place them accordingly, in order.

I've added a `<spacezone-level>` object with 10 `<spacezone-waypoint>` child objects to define the obstacle course route. Please review the waypoint positions to ensure they align with the intended navigation path for the player's ship.
Space our waypoints out further, and make them follow more of a winding path

Hello,

I have spaced out the waypoints further and adjusted their positions to create a more winding path as requested. Please review the updated waypoint positions to ensure they meet your requirements.
please use the y axis as well, the waypoints are currently in a single plane and that's boring. And, space them out even more, the total length of our path should be about 1000m to start
Change the x position of our waypoints so that they don't increase monotonously, they should move around randomly within the range -200..200

I've updated the waypoint x positions to random values within the range of -200 to 200 to ensure they do not increase monotonously. Please review the changes and let me know if you need further adjustments or have any additional requirements.
Change the y position of our waypoints so that they move around randomly within the range -200..200
I've updated the y positions of all spacezone-waypoints to random values within the range of -200 to 200.
first waypoint shoudl start at 0,0,0
I've updated the first waypoint position to start at (0, 0, 0) as requested. Let me know if you need any further adjustments or additional waypoints.
muiltiply the z position of each waypoint by 10

I've updated the z positions of all `spacezone-waypoint` elements by multiplying them by 10 as requested. Please review the changes below and let me know if there are any further adjustments you'd like to make.
Add a new assetobject named "shuttle" pointing to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jbaicoianu/elation-component-space/refs/heads/master/media/models/shuttle2.obj
I've added the new `assetobject` named "shuttle" to the assets section. Let me know if you need it placed within the room or have any other modifications in mind.
Add a <spacezone-player> object to our room
I've added a `<spacezone-player>` object to the room as requested. Please let me know if you need any specific configurations or properties for this player.
Set the spacezone-player's initial zdir to 0 0 -1
I've updated the `spacezone-player` element to set its initial `zdir` attribute to `0 0 -1`. Let me know if you need any further adjustments or have additional specifications.
set room pos to 25 0 0
Room position has been updated to (25, 0, 0). Let me know if you require any further adjustments or have questions.
set room dir to 0 0 1
I've updated the room's direction to `0 0 1` as requested. Please review the changes below.
set room showavatar to false
I've updated the room configuration to set `showavatar` to `false` as requested.
set room pointerlock to false
I've updated the room configuration to disable pointer lock by setting `pointerlock` to `false`. Let me know if you need any additional adjustments or have further requirements.
Add a <spacezone-asteroidfield> object to our room
Added a `<spacezone-asteroidfield>` object to the room. Let me know if you need to configure specific properties for the asteroid field.
Increase the room's far_dist to 5000
I've updated the room's `far_dist` to 5000 as requested. Let me know if you need any further adjustments or have additional changes in mind.
Reduce near_dist to 0.1

Hello,

I've updated the `<room>` element by setting `near_dist` to `0.1` as requested. Please review the change to ensure it meets your project's requirements.
Move the asteroidfield inside of our level
Certainly. I have moved the asteroidfield inside the spacezone-level within the room as requested. Please review the changes below and let me know if any further adjustments are needed.
Make the spacezone-player a child of the level too
The `spacezone-player` has been moved to be a child of the `spacezone-level` to better organize the hierarchy within the level.
